name: Woodside Wings
description: Ten juicy wings tossed with your choice of Mild, Medium, HOT, EXTRA HOT, Gold Rush, SPICY ORANGE GLAZE, sweet Thai Chili, Sweet Chipotle BBQ, SPICY BBQ, CAJUN SEASONED, or Texas Dry Rub, BBQ, Spicy BBQ, Garlic Parmesan (regular or hot). Served with celery & bleu cheese.

name: Boneless Wings
description: Deep-fried boneless chicken breast tossed in your choice of wing sauce.

name: Beer-Battered Onion Rings
description: A shareable portion of crispy deep-fried onion rings with a side of sweet and SPICY Cajun remoulade for dipping.

name: Chili & Chips
description: House-made chili with a really nice kick, topped with a shredded two-cheese blend and surrounded with warmed tortilla chips.

name: Fried Mozzarella
description: House-made mozzarella cheese, hand-breaded & deep fried to a golden brown. Served with marinara or raspberry melba.

name: Chicken Tenders
description: Crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside! These yummy strips of seasoned deep-fried chicken breast are served with a side of Sweet Baby Ray’s BBQ sauce.

name: Crab Bites
description: Five deep-fried crab bites encrusted with panko breadcrumbs, served on a bed of lettuce with zesty sour cream sauce and chipotle mayo on the side.

name: Pretzel Bites
description: Buttery, salted deep-fried pretzel bites, crusty on the outside, soft in the middle. Served with creamy beer cheese.  For a twist, try them tossed in garlic parmesan with marinara dipping sauce!

name: CWT Quesadillas
description: Peppers, onions, tomatoes, Monterey Jack and cheddar cheese on a grilled flour tortilla, served with salsa and sour cream on the side. (Add Shredded Grilled Chicken for $7 or Ground Beef for $5)

name: Yellow Fin Tuna
description: 6oz of lightly peppered and perfectly seared Yellow Fin tuna topped with a sweet and SPICY orange glaze, crispy wonton strips, and sesame seeds.

name: Soup du Jour
description:
Always scrumptious!
6.95 Cup/8.95 Bowl

name: French Onion Au Gratin
description: Top-secret house recipe!

name: Chili
description: A bowl of our house-made chili topped with a shredded two-cheese blend and diced onion. 6.95 Cup/8.95 Bowl

name: Tossed
description: Mixed greens with cherry tomatoes, carrots, red onions, cucumbers & house seasoned croutons. Small 6.95/Large 10.95

name: Caesar
description: Crisp Romaine tossed with seasoned house croutons, grated parmesan cheese & Caesar dressing.  Small 8.95/Large 12.95

name: Southwest Chicken Salad
description: Grilled, CAJUN SPICED 8 oz. sliced chicken breast over mixed greens tossed with diced tomatoes, red onion, avocado, cilantro, lime juice, black beans, and a two-cheese blend. Topped with crispy tortilla strips. We recommend the Jalapeno Ranch dressing!

name: Spinach
description: Baby spinach, crumbled Gorgonzola cheese, roasted red peppers, crumbled bacon, roasted mushrooms, hard-boiled egg, red onion. 10.95 Small/16.95 Large

name: Pub Club
description: Mixed greens topped with fresh roasted turkey, ham, Swiss cheese, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, hard-boiled egg & crumbled bacon. You won't leave hungry, that's for sure!

name: Candied Pecan, Apple & Gorgonzola
description: Mixed greens, slivered red onion, dried cranberries, crisp apple slices, candied pecans & Gorgonzola cheese.

name: The Wedge
description: Crisp iceberg lettuce, bleu cheese dressing, bleu cheese crumbles, bacon crumbles, slivered red onions, and diced tomatoes.

name: Baked Ham
description:
Served with chips and a crisp dill pickle. Lettuce, tomato, and onion available upon request.
Choice of Toppings
Mayo, chipotle mayo, Russian dressing, Gulden’s spicy brown mustard, yellow mustard, horseradish, tiger sauce.
Choice of Bread
Brioche roll, white, wheat, marble rye, flour wrap, or gluten-free bread.
Add Cheese 
American, Swiss, cheddar, fresh mozzarella, smoked Gouda – add  
$1.50

name: The Mother Clucker
description: Grilled chicken, cheddar, bacon, lettuce and tomato with ranch dressing on a brioche roll.

name: Classic Reuben
description: Our own Guinness-braised, thinly sliced corned beef, hot sauerkraut, Swiss cheese & Russian dressing piled on rye and grilled to perfection.

name: Steve-O's Grilled Turkey
description: Grilled sliced turkey, melted cheddar cheese, crispy bacon and crunchy apple on grilled white bread spread generously with a scrumptious cranberry maple mayo.

name: The Rachel
description: Sliced turkey, cole slaw, Swiss cheese & Russian dressing served on rye and grilled to a golden brown.

name: Maddy's Ham 'n Cheese
description: Virginia baked ham, cheddar and American cheeses, and sliced tomato on grilled white bread.

name: Tuna Melt
description: Tuna salad on grilled whole wheat bread with melted cheddar, tomato, and mayo.

name: Kickin' Chicken
description: SPICY CAJUN blackened chicken strips, jalapenos, bacon, cheddar cheese, sautéed peppers & onions with BBQ sauce. Hot, SPICY, & full of flavor!

name: Blackened Chicken
description: SPICY CAJUN blackened chicken, lettuce, diced tomato, cheddar cheese & ranch dressing.

name: Chicken Caesar
description: Juicy strips of grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons & Caesar dressing.

name: Chicken Chipotle
description: Juicy grilled chicken strips, roasted red peppers, cheddar cheese, lettuce, diced tomato, and house-made chipotle mayonnaise.

name: Veggie
description: Mixed greens, cucumbers, shredded carrots, peppers, red onions, diced tomatoes, roasted mushrooms, black beans, and roasted red peppers with balsamic vinaigrette.

name: Buffalo Chicken
description: Crispy (or grilled) chicken with lettuce, onions, bacon, bleu cheese dressing & HOT Sauce.

name: The Classic
description: Just our basic amazing burger. (Add cheese,  beer cheese, or avocado -$1.50 each. Add sautéed mushrooms, peppers or onions -$1.00 each. Add bacon-$2.25)

name: The Western
description: Grilled to perfection and topped with bacon, cheddar cheese, Sweet Baby Ray’s BBQ sauce and a crispy deep-fried beer-battered onion ring.

name: Black, Bleu and Gold Burger
description: Grilled with our popular CAJUN BLACKENING SPICES & topped with crumbled bleu cheese, onion marmalade and sweet and tangy Gold Rush sauce.

name: Veggie Burger
description: Hearty three grain burger (brown rice, quinoa and bulgar) with roasted corn, black beans, and roasted peppers, topped with avocado, lettuce, tomato and red onion.

name: Bacon & Gouda
description: Our juicy burger topped with crispy bacon, smoked Gouda, & chipotle mayo.

name: Patty Melt
description: Spiced up with Montreal seasoning and served on grilled rye bread with Swiss cheese and caramelized onions.

name: Turkey Burger
description: Savory burger of ground white turkey grilled and served on a brioche roll with chipotle mayo, avocado, lettuce, tomato, and red onion.

name: Slamburger!
description:
An old favorite returns! Our 8oz burger, cooked to perfection and topped with a sweet and 
SPICY jalapeno bacon jam, and gouda cheese.

name: Buffalo Burger
description: Topped with crumbled bleu cheese, HOT sauce, and bacon.

name: Braveheart NY Strip
description: - Choice 12 oz. NY strip steak, grilled to your liking and served with Chef's choice potato and fresh vegetable du jour. (SPICY CAJUN seasoning – add 1.50. Crumbly bleu cheese – add 1.50.)

name: The Rice is Right
description: A bountiful bowl of savory jasmine rice tossed with roasted red peppers, mushrooms, spinach, and carrots.  (Add Avocaco- $1.50, 8 oz. Chicken-$8, Salmon-$12, Shrimp-$12)

name: Hot Chix!
description: Two juicy 8 oz. chicken breasts, marinated, grilled, and served with your choice of dipping sauce (BBQ, Honey Dijon, Sweet Thai Chili, or any salad dressing). Comes with Chef's choice potato and our fresh vegetable du jour. Like an extra kick? Get 'em BLACKENED!

name: Not Your Kid's Mac & Cheese
description: Elbow macaroni tossed in a rich, creamy three-cheese sauce seasoned with garlic, shallots, and white wine; finished en casserole with a crunchy panko and parmesan topping. (Add Bacon-$3 Chopped Tiger Shrimp-$6, Fried Chicken-$7)

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Tender salmon, grilled to perfection and served with roasted red pepper cream sauce, sautéed spinach, and savory jasmine rice.

name: Buffalo Mac 'n Cheese
description: Our awesome “Not Your Kid’s” jazzed up with HOT buffalo sauce, breaded deep-fried chicken, and bleu cheese crumbles. So good!

name: Sirloin Steak
description:
Choice 8 oz. sirloin steak grilled to your liking and served with Chef's fresh vegetable du jour and your choice of side.* ( SPICY CAJUN seasoning, add 1.50/Crumbled bleu cheese, add 1.50)
*Choice of Sides*
Baked Potato (available after 4:00 PM), Beer-Battered Fries, Jasmine Rice, Cole Slaw, Mac Salad
Sweet Potato Fries, add $1.95
Beer-Battered Onion Rings, add $2.95

name: Cajun Chicken & Shrimp
description: SPICY CAJUN chicken & shrimp tossed in a light garlic Alfredo sauce over fettuccine.

name: Beer-Battered Fish and Chips
description: Lightly battered haddock filet, deep-fried and served with beer-battered fries* and a side of tartar or cocktail sauce on the side. *Sub sweet potato fries, add $1.95. Sub onion rings, add $2.50.

name: The Woodsman
description: A generous 8oz marinated pork tenderloin, grilled, sliced and draped in our savory apple demi-glace, served with Chef’s choice potato and our fresh vegetable du jour.

name: Beer-Battered Onion Rings
description: With SPICY CAJUN remoulade.

name: Carrot Cake
description:
Carrot Cake
Ultra-moist cake with shredded carrots, pecan pieces & crushed pineapple. Topped with delicious cream cheese frosting and chopped walnuts.

name: Key Lime Pie
description: Graham cracker crust, fluffy key lime center topped with whipped cream, toasted coconut and freshly zested lime.

name: New York Cheesecake
description: Rich, delicious NY style cheesecake with graham cracker crust, drizzled with raspberry sauce.

name: Reese's Peanut Butter Cake
description: Dark chocolate cake with chocolate butter cream frosting and peanut butter cream cheese filling, topped with melted chunks of dark chocolate and peanut butter chips drizzled with chocolate

name: Orange Phyllo Cake
description:
Shredded phyllo pastry dough mixed with 
Greek yogurt, and sweet orange pulp make this cake 
as unique as it is delicious. Bright and sweet, it’s the perfect finish to your meal

name: Monday - Mussels Night
description:
MONDAY 
Mussels Night
A pound of mussels prepared to your liking. Choose from a decadent roasted leek and cream sauce, white wine and garlic, or steamed with drawn butter.

name: Wednesday - Hot Turkey Dinner
description:
Fresh sliced, slow-roasted turkey, herb gravy, house-made stuffing, mashed potatoes,        cranberry sauce, fresh vegetable du jour.
Wine Wednesday 
All house wines-$6

name: Thursday - Taco Night
description: Three ground chorizo, birria, OR pulled chicken tacos (no mix ‘n match, please) with a soft flour wrap, fresh pico, cilantro lime rice, queso cheese, and a fresh lime wedge, topped with cilantro.

name: Friday and Saturday - Prime Rib Dinner
description: Served Friday and Saturday after 4 PM, while it lasts) Marinated and artfully seasoned, 14-ounce slow roasted CHOICE PRIME RIB served with Chef’s choice potato and our fresh vegetable du jour.  Start with your choice of soup or salad.

name: Sunday - St. Louis Style Ribs
description: A half rack of scrumptious ribs coated in our Texas dry rub and glazed with Sweet Baby Ray’s BBQ sauce, with cole slaw and extra BBQ on the side. Served with beer battered fries.
